name: styledictionary
description: Interface for Style Dictionary to prebuild Arcana/Moonjoule web projects from Figma.

scripts.prebuild: npm run html && npm run tokens
scripts.build-and-preview: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.dev: npm run html && npm run tokens && parcel src/index-*.html
scripts.dev:watch: npm run html && npm run tokens && npm run watch:tokens & parcel src/index-*.html
scripts.watch:build: nodemon --watch src --watch build/css --watch css --watch js --ext html,css,scss,js --exec 'npm run build'
